page.title: 08Dores/Abriachan_Loch Cruise
page.content: "We enjoyed our cruise.The gates were opening and we went through.The boat went through and the boat was floating.Then the boat went round the corner where the sheep were.Isaw Abriachan.I liked steering the boat . Then we turned and went back to town. Then we got off the boat." "{Andrew was steering the Jacobite {over a long,blue wave.Then it was {David's turn.He put the steering wheel {round in circles." "Yesterday morning my school went to the place where you can go on a boat . We went on the Jacobite.Anthea steered the Jacobite.Then I did,then Tracey, Roslyn and Jennifer.Next it was the boys turn.The gates opened and the boat went through.There were two gates.I thought there were four gates but I did not know we were going back".
